vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
ἀνταπο-κρίνομαι [ῑ],
middle, answer again, [LXX+NT]; argue against, τινί[NT]
__II correspond to, [Refs 2nd c.AD+]

relatedNos._zh_tw_Gloss: 還, 因, 作, 為
relatedNos._zh_Gloss: 还, 因, 作, 为

vocabInfos.shortDef: to talk back, answer (with implication of contradicting someone)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
to talk back, answer (with implication of contradicting someone)
occurs in the NT only in the middle, to answer, speak in answer, talk back Lk. 14:6; to reply against, contradict, dispute, Rom. 9:20*
